author: Ursula Perano
title: 3 southern states will begin to ease coronavirus lockdowns
description: Governors in Georgia, Tennessee and South Carolina have announced plans to ease their coronavirus lockdowns.The latest: Georgia Gov. Brian Kemp (R) announced plans on Monday to allow some non-essential businesses to re-open on Friday, the Atlanta Journal-Cons…
content:
Governors in Georgia, Tennessee and South Carolina have announced plans to ease their coronavirus lockdowns.
